comments.body: Why did we need to check for `"PrevFitTMP"` before? Was this simply a bug? What does `git blame` say - did we use `"PrevFitTMP"` some time in the past?

"PrevFitTMP" is name of object created right before fit.
But then it was renamed into something like "PrevFit-3". 
If next time such function was used for fitting, result name was "PrevFit-5-PrevFit-3".
And so on.
